metadata.description: Dynamic tab structure for BOI Land Property Details template

tabs.description: Basic property information and location details

sections.description: Area classification, development status, and civic amenities access
Topography, land shape, and environmental risk factors
Permitted land uses and regulatory limitations
Town planning approvals and plot location characteristics
Road facilities, accessibility, and land-locked status
Water, sewerage, and power supply availability

tabs.description: Detailed assessment of site conditions, infrastructure, and environmental factors

sections.description: Land area calculations and market rates

tabs.description: Detailed valuation components and final calculations
